The Heat, who http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight_Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."

Joel Klein , 64, was in London at the behest of British Education Secretary Michael Gove to speak at a conference. He slammed teacher unions for allowing the bad apples to sour the system. The union is going to protect incompetent workers-- that is their job, said Joel Klein , who now works for News Corp., owner of The Post. Joel Klein remarked that unions are unhappy with the growth of high-performing charter schools because it threatens their "guaranteed client base."
